PERSONA:
meet alex, a 25-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically the east north central division. he was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen. alex recently graduated from college with a bachelor's degree and is considering pursuing a master's program.

alex comes from a lower-income family, with an annual household income between $40,000 and $50,000. despite his modest financial background, he is determined to build a successful career and improve his socioeconomic status.

religiously, alex identifies as a roman catholic and attends religious services once a week. while he holds traditional catholic values, he considers himself a moderate in terms of political ideology. he is registered to vote and leans towards the democratic party, though he remains an independent voter.

in his personal life, alex has never been married and is currently single. he is an avid user of the internet, spending a significant amount of time online for both work and leisure. however, he has not yet found the time or opportunity to engage in volunteer work.

alex is a well-rounded individual with a diverse set of interests and experiences. he is open-minded and always eager to learn and grow, both personally and professionally. with his education, determination, and moderate views, he is poised to navigate the complexities of adulthood and make a positive impact on his community.
